directions.step: Combine 2/3rds of the flour, 1/6th of the white sugar and the salt in a large bowl.
Blend in the butter, and stir in the water until the dough stays together but isn't sticky.
Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and put it in the fridge for at least 30 mins.
Slice plums in eighths, and combine with 2/3rds of the white sugar.
Add ginger, cinnamon, cloves to taste and mix.
Combine 1/6th of the flour, all of the brown sugar, the last 1/6th of the white sugar and the ground cinnamon and mix well.
Add the cream to bind the ingredients of the 'Streusel', while maintaining a crumbly texture.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Roll the dough into a circular shape and place in your pie pan.
Put the filling in the dough.
Crumble the 'Streusel' over the top of the plum filling, making sure to cover the whole Galette.
Sprinkle the almond slivers over the top of the Galette.
Fold the edges of the dough over to create a nice crust around the whole Galette.
Put the Galette in the oven for about 1 hour or until the crust becomes a nice golden color.
